description: A delicious hint of custard in these biscuits, enjoy with a cuppa for morning or afternoon Tea.
name: Iced Custard Bikkies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together. Preheat oven 170 degrees fan forced. Grease and line 2 baking trays.
Into a large bowl add butter and sugar, beat until light and creamy. Add egg and Vanilla. Beat again until well incorporated.
Add in dry ingredients and mix. It looks a little dry. But the mixture will come together.
Roll mixture into small balls and space apart on baking trays. gently flatten the tops with a floured fork.
Bake for 12 - 15 minutes or until lightly golden (each oven is different). Remove from Oven, cool on trays for 5 minutes. Then cool completely on a wire rack.

ICING DIRECTIONS - Into a small bowl, add icing mixture, custard powder and butter. Then enough boiling water to reach desired consistency. I use a disposable piping bag to pipe on the icing, but a palette knife works just as well.
